## ğŸ›¡ï¸ **Ğ Ğ¾Ğ»ĞµĞ²Ğ°Ñ Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ´ĞµĞ»ÑŒ Ğ¸ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ°Ğ²Ğ° Ğ´Ğ¾ÑÑ‚ÑƒĞ¿Ğ°**

**Ğ’ ÑĞ¸ÑÑ‚ĞµĞ¼Ğµ Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ»ÑŒĞºĞ¾ Ğ´Ğ²Ğµ Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ¸:**

**Ğ Ğ¾Ğ»ÑŒ admin Ğ½Ğµ Ğ¸ÑĞ¿Ğ¾Ğ»ÑŒĞ·ÑƒĞµÑ‚ÑÑ.**
**Ğ Ğ¾Ğ»ÑŒ clerk = storeKeeper.**

**ĞŸĞ¾Ğ»ÑŒĞ·Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ñ‚ĞµĞ»Ğ¸ Ğ¸ Ğ¿Ğ¾ÑÑ‚Ğ°Ğ²Ñ‰Ğ¸ĞºĞ¸ Ğ¿Ñ€ĞµĞ´Ğ·Ğ°Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ½ÑÑÑ‚ÑÑ Ğ² Ğ±Ğ°Ğ·Ğµ Ğ´Ğ°Ğ½Ğ½Ñ‹Ñ….**

### **Ğ”Ğ¾ÑÑ‚ÑƒĞ¿ Ğ¿Ğ¾ Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ»ÑĞ¼ (ÑĞºÑ€Ğ°Ğ½Ñ‹)**

## ğŸ”Œ **Frontend Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ´ĞµĞ»Ğ¸ / DTO (TypeScript)**

> ĞŸÑ€Ğ¸Ğ¼ĞµÑ‡Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ğµ: Ğ°Ğ²Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ°Ñ†Ğ¸Ñ ÑĞµĞ¹Ñ‡Ğ°Ñ cookie-based (`sessionId` Ğ² httpOnly cookie), Ğ¿Ğ¾ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ¼Ñƒ Ñ„Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ½Ñ‚Ñƒ Ğ´Ğ¾ÑÑ‚Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ‡Ğ½Ğ¾ Ğ²Ñ‹Ğ·Ñ‹Ğ²Ğ°Ñ‚ÑŒ `POST /auth/login` Ğ¸ Ğ·Ğ°Ñ‚ĞµĞ¼ `GET /auth/me`.

```ts
export type UserRole = "manager" | "storeKeeper";

export interface MeResponse {
	id: string; // uuid
	login: string;
	firstname: string;
	lastname: string;
	middlename?: string;
	role: UserRole;
}

export interface LoginRequest {
	login: string;
	password: string;
}

export type DocumentType = "incoming" | "transfer" | "production";
export type DocumentStatus = "draft" | "completed" | "cancelled";

export interface Supplier {
	id: number;
	name: string;
	inn?: string;
	contact_person?: string;
	phone?: string;
	email?: string;
	address?: string;
}

export interface Warehouse {
	id: number;
	name: string;
	address?: string;
}

// Ğ’ MVP Ğ´Ğ¾ÑÑ‚Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ‡Ğ½Ğ¾ 2 Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ² Ğ´Ğ»Ñ UI: Ğ¼Ğ°Ñ‚ĞµÑ€Ğ¸Ğ°Ğ»Ñ‹ Ğ¸ Ğ³Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ñ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ´ÑƒĞºÑ†Ğ¸Ñ.
// Ğ•ÑĞ»Ğ¸ Ğ±ÑƒĞ´ĞµÑ‚ Ğ½ÑƒĞ¶Ğ½Ğ¾ â€” Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ¶Ğ½Ğ¾ Ñ€Ğ°ÑÑˆĞ¸Ñ€Ğ¸Ñ‚ÑŒ (Ğ½Ğ°Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ¼ĞµÑ€, components/Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ»ÑƒÑ„Ğ°Ğ±Ñ€Ğ¸ĞºĞ°Ñ‚Ñ‹).
export type ItemType = "material" | "product";

export interface Item {
	id: number;
	code: string;
	name: string;
	unit: string;
	type: ItemType;
	min_quantity: string; // decimal as string
	description?: string;
}

export type DocumentItemDirection = "in" | "out";

export interface DocumentItemInput {
	itemId: number;
	quantity: string; // decimal as string
	direction?: DocumentItemDirection; // Ğ¾Ğ±ÑĞ·Ğ°Ñ‚ĞµĞ»ÑŒĞ½Ğ¾ Ğ´Ğ»Ñ production
}

export interface CreateDocumentRequest {
	type: DocumentType;
	date?: string; // YYYY-MM-DD
	warehouseFromId?: number;
	warehouseToId?: number;
	supplierId?: number;
	comment?: string;
	items: DocumentItemInput[];
}

export interface DocumentListItem {
	id: number;
	number: string;
	type: DocumentType;
	status: DocumentStatus;
	date: string; // YYYY-MM-DD
	warehouseFromId?: number;
	warehouseToId?: number;
	supplierId?: number;
}

export interface DocumentItem {
	id: number;
	itemId: number;
	quantity: string;
	direction?: DocumentItemDirection;
}

export interface DocumentDetail extends DocumentListItem {
	userId: string;
	comment?: string;
	items: DocumentItem[];
}

export interface StockBalance {
	itemId: number;
	warehouseId: number;
	quantity: string;
	reserved: string;
	available: string;
}
```

## ğŸ—ƒï¸ **ĞÑĞ½Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ½Ñ‹Ğµ Ñ‚Ğ°Ğ±Ğ»Ğ¸Ñ†Ñ‹ Ğ‘Ğ”**

### **1. Ğ¢Ğ°Ğ±Ğ»Ğ¸Ñ†Ğ° `users` (ĞŸĞ¾Ğ»ÑŒĞ·Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ñ‚ĞµĞ»Ğ¸, Ğ°ĞºÑ‚ÑƒĞ°Ğ»ÑŒĞ½Ğ¾)**

```sql
CREATE TABLE users (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,

  -- ĞĞ²Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ°Ñ†Ğ¸Ñ
  login VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
  password_hash VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,

  -- Ğ”Ğ°Ğ½Ğ½Ñ‹Ğµ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ»ÑŒĞ·Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ñ‚ĞµĞ»Ñ
  firstname VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  lastname VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  middlename VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,

  -- Ğ Ğ¾Ğ»ÑŒ (Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ»ÑŒĞºĞ¾ 2 Ğ²Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ°Ğ½Ñ‚Ğ°)
  role VARCHAR(20) CHECK (role IN ('manager', 'storeKeeper')) NOT NULL,

  -- Ğ¡Ğ¸ÑÑ‚ĞµĞ¼Ğ½Ñ‹Ğµ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ»Ñ
  created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT NOW(),
  updated_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT NOW()
);
```

**Ğ˜Ğ½Ğ´ĞµĞºÑÑ‹:**

```sql
CREATE INDEX idx_users_login ON users(login);
CREATE INDEX idx_users_role ON users(role);
```

---

### **2. Ğ¢Ğ°Ğ±Ğ»Ğ¸Ñ†Ğ° `warehouses` (Ğ¡ĞºĞ»Ğ°Ğ´Ñ‹)**

```sql
CREATE TABLE warehouses (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
  address TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT NOW(),
  updated_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT NOW()
);
```

---

### **3. Ğ¢Ğ°Ğ±Ğ»Ğ¸Ñ†Ğ° `suppliers` (ĞŸĞ¾ÑÑ‚Ğ°Ğ²Ñ‰Ğ¸ĞºĞ¸, seed)**

```sql
CREATE TABLE suppliers (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  inn VARCHAR(20),
  contact_person VARCHAR(255),
  phone VARCHAR(50),
  email VARCHAR(255),
  address TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT NOW(),
  updated_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT NOW()
);
```

---

### **4. Ğ¢Ğ°Ğ±Ğ»Ğ¸Ñ†Ğ° `items` (ĞĞ¾Ğ¼ĞµĞ½ĞºĞ»Ğ°Ñ‚ÑƒÑ€Ğ°)**

```sql
CREATE TABLE items (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,

    -- Ğ˜Ğ´ĞµĞ½Ñ‚Ğ¸Ñ„Ğ¸ĞºĞ°Ñ†Ğ¸Ñ
    code VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE NOT NULL,        -- Ğ’Ğ½ÑƒÑ‚Ñ€ĞµĞ½Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ¹ ĞºĞ¾Ğ´
    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,               -- ĞĞ°Ğ¸Ğ¼ĞµĞ½Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ğµ

    -- ĞšĞ»Ğ°ÑÑĞ¸Ñ„Ğ¸ĞºĞ°Ñ†Ğ¸Ñ
    type VARCHAR(20) CHECK (type IN ('material', 'product')) NOT NULL,

    -- Ğ•Ğ´Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ†Ñ‹ Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ¼ĞµÑ€ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ñ
    unit VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,                -- ĞºĞ³, ÑˆÑ‚, Ğ», Ğ¼

    -- Ğ¦ĞµĞ½Ñ‹
    purchase_price DECIMAL(14,2),             -- Ğ¡Ñ€ĞµĞ´Ğ½ÑÑ Ñ†ĞµĞ½Ğ° Ğ·Ğ°ĞºÑƒĞ¿ĞºĞ¸
    sell_price DECIMAL(14,2),                 -- Ğ¦ĞµĞ½Ğ° Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ°Ğ¶Ğ¸ (Ğ´Ğ»Ñ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ´ÑƒĞºÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ²)

    -- ĞšĞ¾Ğ½Ñ‚Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ»ÑŒ Ğ¾ÑÑ‚Ğ°Ñ‚ĞºĞ¾Ğ²
    min_quantity DECIMAL(14,3) DEFAULT 0,     -- ĞœĞ¸Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ»ÑŒĞ½Ñ‹Ğ¹ Ğ¾ÑÑ‚Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğº

    -- Ğ”Ğ¾Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ‚ĞµĞ»ÑŒĞ½Ğ¾
    description TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT NOW(),
    updated_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT NOW()
);
```

**Ğ˜Ğ½Ğ´ĞµĞºÑÑ‹:**

```sql
CREATE INDEX idx_items_code ON items(code);
CREATE INDEX idx_items_type ON items(type);
CREATE INDEX idx_items_name ON items(name);
```

### **5. Ğ¢Ğ°Ğ±Ğ»Ğ¸Ñ†Ğ° `documents` (Ğ”Ğ¾ĞºÑƒĞ¼ĞµĞ½Ñ‚Ñ‹)**

```sql
CREATE TABLE documents (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,

    -- ĞÑƒĞ¼ĞµÑ€Ğ°Ñ†Ğ¸Ñ
    number VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE NOT NULL,       -- ĞŸĞ -0001, Ğ Ğ¡-0001

    -- Ğ¢Ğ¸Ğ¿ Ğ¸ ÑÑ‚Ğ°Ñ‚ÑƒÑ
    type VARCHAR(20) CHECK (type IN ('incoming', 'transfer', 'production')) NOT NULL,
    status VARCHAR(20) CHECK (status IN ('draft', 'completed', 'cancelled')) DEFAULT 'draft',

    -- ĞœĞµÑ‚Ğ°Ğ´Ğ°Ğ½Ğ½Ñ‹Ğµ
    user_id UUID NOT NULL REFERENCES users(id),
    date DATE NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_DATE,
    -- Ğ¡ĞºĞ»Ğ°Ğ´Ñ‹. Ğ’ Ğ·Ğ°Ğ²Ğ¸ÑĞ¸Ğ¼Ğ¾ÑÑ‚Ğ¸ Ğ¾Ñ‚ Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ¿Ğ° Ğ´Ğ¾ĞºÑƒĞ¼ĞµĞ½Ñ‚Ğ° Ğ¸ÑĞ¿Ğ¾Ğ»ÑŒĞ·ÑƒÑÑ‚ÑÑ Ğ¿Ğ¾-Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ¼Ñƒ:
    -- incoming: warehouse_to_id
    -- transfer: warehouse_from_id + warehouse_to_id
    -- production: warehouse_from_id (ÑĞ¿Ğ¸ÑĞ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ğµ Ğ¼Ğ°Ñ‚ĞµÑ€Ğ¸Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ²) + warehouse_to_id (Ğ¾Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸Ñ…Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ğµ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ´ÑƒĞºÑ†Ğ¸Ğ¸)
    warehouse_from_id INTEGER REFERENCES warehouses(id),
    warehouse_to_id INTEGER REFERENCES warehouses(id),

    -- ĞŸĞ¾ÑÑ‚Ğ°Ğ²Ñ‰Ğ¸Ğº Ğ½ÑƒĞ¶ĞµĞ½ Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ»ÑŒĞºĞ¾ Ğ´Ğ»Ñ incoming
    supplier_id INTEGER REFERENCES suppliers(id),

    -- Ğ¡ÑƒĞ¼Ğ¼Ğ° Ğ¸ ĞºĞ¾Ğ¼Ğ¼ĞµĞ½Ñ‚Ğ°Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ¸
    total_amount DECIMAL(16,2) DEFAULT 0,
    comment TEXT,

    -- ĞŸĞµÑ‡Ğ°Ñ‚ÑŒ
    printed_at TIMESTAMPTZ,
    file_url TEXT,

    -- Ğ¡Ğ¸ÑÑ‚ĞµĞ¼Ğ½Ñ‹Ğµ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ»Ñ
    created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT NOW(),
    updated_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT NOW()
);
```

### **6. Ğ¢Ğ°Ğ±Ğ»Ğ¸Ñ†Ğ° `document_items` (ĞŸĞ¾Ğ·Ğ¸Ñ†Ğ¸Ğ¸ Ğ´Ğ¾ĞºÑƒĞ¼ĞµĞ½Ñ‚Ğ°)**

```sql
CREATE TABLE document_items (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  document_id INTEGER NOT NULL REFERENCES documents(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,

  item_id INTEGER NOT NULL REFERENCES items(id),
  quantity DECIMAL(14,3) NOT NULL,
  price DECIMAL(14,2),
  amount DECIMAL(16,2),

  -- ĞĞ°Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ°Ğ²Ğ»ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ğµ Ğ´Ğ²Ğ¸Ğ¶ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ñ (Ğ½ÑƒĞ¶Ğ½Ğ¾ Ğ² Ğ¿ĞµÑ€Ğ²ÑƒÑ Ğ¾Ñ‡ĞµÑ€ĞµĞ´ÑŒ Ğ´Ğ»Ñ production):
  -- out = ÑĞ¿Ğ¸ÑĞ°Ñ‚ÑŒ ÑĞ¾ ÑĞºĞ»Ğ°Ğ´Ğ° Ğ¼Ğ°Ñ‚ĞµÑ€Ğ¸Ğ°Ğ»Ñ‹, in = Ğ¾Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸Ñ…Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ñ‚ÑŒ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ´ÑƒĞºÑ†Ğ¸Ñ
  direction VARCHAR(3) CHECK (direction IN ('in', 'out')),

  created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT NOW()
);
```

**Ğ˜Ğ½Ğ´ĞµĞºÑÑ‹:**

```sql
CREATE INDEX idx_documents_number ON documents(number);
CREATE INDEX idx_documents_date ON documents(date);
CREATE INDEX idx_documents_type ON documents(type);
CREATE INDEX idx_documents_user_id ON documents(user_id);
CREATE INDEX idx_documents_status ON documents(status);
CREATE INDEX idx_documents_items ON documents USING gin(items);
```

### **7. Ğ¢Ğ°Ğ±Ğ»Ğ¸Ñ†Ğ° `stock_balances` (ĞÑÑ‚Ğ°Ñ‚ĞºĞ¸ Ğ¿Ğ¾ ÑĞºĞ»Ğ°Ğ´Ğ°Ğ¼)**

```sql
CREATE TABLE stock_balances (
    -- Ğ¡Ğ¾ÑÑ‚Ğ°Ğ²Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ğ¿ĞµÑ€Ğ²Ğ¸Ñ‡Ğ½Ñ‹Ğ¹ ĞºĞ»ÑÑ‡
    item_id INTEGER NOT NULL REFERENCES items(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    warehouse_id INTEGER NOT NULL REFERENCES warehouses(id),

    -- ĞšĞ¾Ğ»Ğ¸Ñ‡ĞµÑÑ‚Ğ²Ğ°
    quantity DECIMAL(14,3) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
    reserved DECIMAL(14,3) DEFAULT 0,

    -- Ğ’Ñ‹Ñ‡Ğ¸ÑĞ»ÑĞµĞ¼Ñ‹Ğµ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ»Ñ
    available DECIMAL(14,3) GENERATED ALWAYS AS (quantity - reserved) STORED,

    -- Ğ’Ñ€ĞµĞ¼Ñ Ğ¾Ğ±Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ»ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ñ
    last_updated TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT NOW(),

    PRIMARY KEY (item_id, warehouse_id)
);
```

**Ğ˜Ğ½Ğ´ĞµĞºÑÑ‹:**

```sql
CREATE INDEX idx_stock_balances_item_id ON stock_balances(item_id);
CREATE INDEX idx_stock_balances_quantity ON stock_balances(quantity) WHERE quantity > 0;
CREATE INDEX idx_stock_balances_available ON stock_balances(available) WHERE available > 0;
```

### **5. Ğ¢Ğ°Ğ±Ğ»Ğ¸Ñ†Ğ° `audit_logs` (Ğ›Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¸ Ğ´ĞµĞ¹ÑÑ‚Ğ²Ğ¸Ğ¹)**

```sql
CREATE TABLE audit_logs (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,

    -- ĞšÑ‚Ğ¾
    user_id INTEGER REFERENCES users(id),

    -- Ğ§Ñ‚Ğ¾
    action VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    entity_type VARCHAR(50),
    entity_id INTEGER,

    -- Ğ˜Ğ·Ğ¼ĞµĞ½ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ñ
    old_value JSONB,
    new_value JSONB,

    -- ĞšĞ¾Ğ½Ñ‚ĞµĞºÑÑ‚
    ip_address INET,
    user_agent TEXT,

    -- Ğ’Ñ€ĞµĞ¼Ñ
    created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT NOW()
);
```

**Ğ˜Ğ½Ğ´ĞµĞºÑÑ‹:**

```sql
CREATE INDEX idx_audit_logs_user_id ON audit_logs(user_id);
CREATE INDEX idx_audit_logs_entity ON audit_logs(entity_type, entity_id);
CREATE INDEX idx_audit_logs_created_at ON audit_logs(created_at);
```
